verbs.description: [ARG0: The father of the former Meghan Markle] [V: says] [ARG1: he talked politics with Prince Harry over the phone] — and Harry argued that he should give President Donald Trump a chance .

The father of the former Meghan Markle says he talked politics with Prince Harry over the phone — and Harry argued that he [V: should] give President Donald Trump a chance .
